Title: Relates to providing additional duties of the community gardens task force
Summary: Requires the community gardens task force to conduct an assessment of all community gardens located on publicly owned land in the state to facilitate each garden's designation as a critical environmental area.
LawCode: Amd ยง31-j, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to providing additional duties of the community gardens task force
